PAGE.title: Max Cup | Re-Cups – Production, Renting & Washing
PAGE.description: Get re-cups for every event. Rent, wash, and use reusable cups. Custom production available and request your personalized eco-friendly offer.

BANNER.clean: Clean energy, clean cups, cleaner future!

WHYUS.title: Why Max Cup?
WHYUS.paragraph: With our team, which has nearly 30 years of sales experience and more than 7 years of Re-Cup service experience, we serve our clients coming from almost every sector. Depending on the client's needs, our unique system allows token-free Re-Cup returns, enhancing the user experience! Whether it’s Re-Cup renting, Re-Cup washing, Re-Cup storage, or custom Re-Cup manufacturing, we are always ready to assist our partners in every way!

SERVICES.title: Our Services
SERVICES.production_description: Design your event’s look in a unique style and eco-friendly way with Re-Cups!
SERVICES.renting_description: Rent Re-Cups for your event, they are an eco-friendly, and budget-friendly option!
SERVICES.washing_description: Re-Cups can be used hundreds of times, and every wash is powered by 100% green energy.
SERVICES.logistics_description: With our own fleet of trucks and warehouses, we make transporting and storing Re-Cups simple.
